languages.text: {n}Кассия смотрит в черные провалы глазниц Фесмофориуса со странным выражением на лице и тихо шепчет:{/n} "Отдавая подобные приказы, не отворачивайся. Смотри до конца. Чтобы помнить цену. Чтобы помнить вес своих слов..."
languages.translation_comment: если превалирует каунтер CassiaHatred или Freedom

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия смотрит в черные провалы глазниц Фесмофориуса со странным выражением на лице и тихо шепчет:{/n} "Отдавая подобные приказы, не отворачивайся. Смотри до конца. Чтобы помнить цену. Чтобы помнить вес своих слов..."

languages.translation_comment: если превалирует каунтер CassiaHatred или Freedom

languages.text: {n}Cassia peers into the black pits of the Phesmophorius's eyes and, with a strange expression on her face, whispers softly,{/n} "When you give an order like that, do not look away. Keep watching until the end, so that you remember the price that was paid. So that you remember the weight of your words..."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия смотрит в черные провалы глазниц Фесмофориуса со странным выражением на лице и тихо шепчет:{/n} "Отдавая подобные приказы, не отворачивайся. Смотри до конца. Чтобы помнить цену. Чтобы помнить вес своих слов..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia peers into the black pits of the Phesmophorius's eyes and, with a strange expression, whispers softly,{/n} "When you give an order like that, do not look away. Keep watching until the end. So that you remember the price that was paid. So that you remember the weight of your words..."

{n}Cassia peers into the statue's flaming eyes with a strange expression, and whispers softly: "When you give an order like that, don't look away. Keep watching until the end. So that you remember the price that was paid. So that you remember the weight of your words..."

Keep watching until the end, so that you remember the price that was paid. So that you remember the weight of your words..."

languages.text: {n}Cassia blickt mit einem seltsamen Gesichtsausdruck in die schwarzen Augenhöhlen des Phesmophorius und flüstert leise: {/n}"Wenn Ihr mir einen solchen Befehl erteilt, schaut nicht weg. Seht bis zuletzt zu, damit Ihr Euch an den Preis erinnert, der bezahlt wurde. Und an das Gewicht Eurer Worte ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia peers into the black pits of the Phesmophorius's eyes and, with a strange expression on her face, whispers softly,{/n} "When you give an order like that, do not look away. Keep watching until the end, so that you remember the price that was paid. So that you remember the weight of your words..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia blickt mit einem seltsamen Gesichtsausdruck in die schwarzen Augenhöhlen des Phesmophorius und flüstert leise: {/n}"Wenn Ihr mir einen solchen Befehl erteilt, schaut nicht weg. Seht bis zuletzt zu, damit Ihr Euch an den Preis erinnert, der bezahlt wurde. Und an das Gewicht Eurer Worte ..."

{n}Cassia blickt mit einem seltsamen Gesichtsausdruck in die flammenden Augen der Statue und flüstert leise: {/n}"Wenn Ihr mir einen solchen Befehl erteilt, schaut nicht weg. Seht bis zum Ende zu. Damit Ihr Euch an den Preis erinnert, der bezahlt wurde. Und an das Gewicht Eurer Worte ..."

languages.text: {n}Cassia regarde dans les orbites obscures du Phesmophorius et, avec une expression étrange, murmure :{/n} « Lorsque vous donnez un tel ordre, ne détournez pas les yeux. Continuez à regarder jusqu'à la fin, pour graver dans votre mémoire le prix qui a été payé. Pour ne jamais oublier le poids de vos paroles... »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia peers into the black pits of the Phesmophorius's eyes and, with a strange expression on her face, whispers softly,{/n} "When you give an order like that, do not look away. Keep watching until the end, so that you remember the price that was paid. So that you remember the weight of your words..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia regarde dans les orbites obscures du Phesmophorius et, avec une expression étrange, murmure :{/n} « Lorsque vous donnez un tel ordre, ne détournez pas les yeux. Continuez à regarder jusqu'à la fin, pour graver dans votre mémoire le prix qui a été payé. Pour ne jamais oublier le poids de vos paroles... »

{n}Cassia regarde dans les yeux ardents de la statue et, avec une expression étrange, murmure :{/n} « Lorsque vous donnez un tel ordre, ne détournez pas les yeux. Continuez à regarder jusqu'à la fin. Pour graver dans votre mémoire le prix qui a été payé. Pour ne jamais oublier le poids de vos paroles... »

languages.text: {n}卡西娅凝视着菲斯摩弗瑞斯漆黑的眼眶，脸上带着古怪的表情，轻声开了口。{/n}“当你下达这样的命令时，不要移开目光，一定要凝视到最后一刻。只有这样，你才不会忘记付出的代价，才会铭记话语的分量……”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia peers into the black pits of the Phesmophorius's eyes and, with a strange expression on her face, whispers softly,{/n} "When you give an order like that, do not look away. Keep watching until the end, so that you remember the price that was paid. So that you remember the weight of your words..."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅凝视着菲斯摩弗瑞斯漆黑的眼眶，脸上带着古怪的表情，轻声开了口。{/n}“当你下达这样的命令时，不要移开目光，一定要凝视到最后一刻。只有这样，你才不会忘记付出的代价，才会铭记话语的分量……”
{n}卡西娅凝视着雕像发光的眼睛，带着古怪的表情，轻声开了口。{/n}“当你下达这样的命令时，千万不要移开视线，一定要凝视到最后一刻。只有这样，你才不会忘记你付出的代价，才会铭记话语的分量……”

languages.text: {n}Cassia escudriña la insondable negrura de las cuencas oculares del fesmoforio y, con expresión indescifrable, susurra con voz queda:{/n} «Cuando dé una orden como esa, no aparte la mirada. Siga observando hasta el final para recordar el precio que ha pagado. Para recordar el peso de sus palabras...».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia peers into the black pits of the Phesmophorius's eyes and, with a strange expression on her face, whispers softly,{/n} "When you give an order like that, do not look away. Keep watching until the end, so that you remember the price that was paid. So that you remember the weight of your words..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia escudriña la insondable negrura de las cuencas oculares del fesmoforio y, con expresión indescifrable, susurra con voz queda:{/n} «Cuando dé una orden como esa, no aparte la mirada. Siga observando hasta el final para recordar el precio que ha pagado. Para recordar el peso de sus palabras...».

{n}Cassia mira los ojos llameantes de la estatua y, con expresión indescifrable, susurra con suavidad:{/n} «Cuando dé una orden como esa, no aparte la mirada. Siga observando hasta el final para recordar el precio que ha pagado. Para recordar el peso de sus palabras...».

languages.text: {n}カシアはフェスモフォリウスの黒く虚ろな目を覗き込み、不思議な表情を浮かべながら、そっとささやいた。{/n}「そのような命令を下す時には、目をそらしてはいけません。払われた代償を忘れないために、最後まで見つめ続けるのです。自分の言葉の重さを忘れないために…」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia peers into the black pits of the Phesmophorius's eyes and, with a strange expression on her face, whispers softly,{/n} "When you give an order like that, do not look away. Keep watching until the end, so that you remember the price that was paid. So that you remember the weight of your words..."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアはフェスモフォリウスの黒く虚ろな目を覗き込み、不思議な表情を浮かべながら、そっとささやいた。{/n}「そのような命令を下す時には、目をそらしてはいけません。払われた代償を忘れないために、最後まで見つめ続けるのです。自分の言葉の重さを忘れないために…」

languages.text: {n}Cassia, Pesmoforyus'un gözlerindeki kara çukurlara bakıp yüzünde tuhaf bir ifadeyle usulca fısıldıyor.{/n} "Böyle bir emir verdiğinde başka yöne bakma. Sonuna dek izle. Ödenen bedeli, sözlerinin ağırlığını ancak böyle hatırlarsın..."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia peers into the black pits of the Phesmophorius's eyes and, with a strange expression on her face, whispers softly,{/n} "When you give an order like that, do not look away. Keep watching until the end, so that you remember the price that was paid. So that you remember the weight of your words..."

{n}Cassia, heykelin alevli gözlerine bakıp tuhaf bir ifadeyle usulca fısıldıyor.{/n} "Böyle bir emir verdiğinde başka yöne bakma. Sonuna dek izle. Ödenen bedeli, sözlerinin ağırlığını ancak böyle hatırlarsın..."
